name: gift-reporter-for-memberpress
description: A WordPress plugin that generates comprehensive reports for the MemberPress Gifting add-on with advanced filtering, showing the linkage between gift givers and recipients.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: cleancss -o assets/css/style.min.css assets/css/style.css && cleancss -o assets/css/admin.min.css assets/css/admin.css
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs assets/js/script.js -o assets/js/script.min.js && uglifyjs assets/js/admin.js -o assets/js/admin.min.js
